title: Hextech Annie [Tibber HP bar bug]
body: Tibbers does not have the same HP bar as every other skin. This makes it really hard to see that Tibbers is in play and how much HP he has left.

replies.body:
Hey! 

I just loaded up Hextech Annie and compared it to base Annie, and it looks like the health bars are the same. (Numbers not being centered is another issue. D:)

http://imgur.com/a/fbvtm

From your screenshot, looks like he may be blocking an enemy minion, causing that red bar above him to make it look like Tibbers' health bar?

This was just recently added in. When posted he was def having HP bar issues. I guess live servers were on a dif patch? Here are some more screenshots of what it used to be even though it's fixed already. 

These are being taken from a video.
http://xcrov.com/sx/08-11-2016-32.png
http://xcrov.com/sx/08-11-2016-29.png
The numbers though. Please for the love of god. They are so off center lmfao!
